name: Gloam Chorant
description: A prophet of rot in motion, the Gloam Chorant spreads the Choir's will not through sermons, but through the arc of his weapon. With each blow, he plants sacred decay, a walking hymn that splits the earth and opens flesh to bloom.
abilities: Sacred Spores: When this model is activated, all friendly THORNBOUND CHOIR models within 6" gain +1 to their Resolve tests until the end of the round.
Fungal Communion: This model can use its action to perform a Resolve test. If successful, all friendly THORNBOUND CHOIR models within 12" can immediately make a free move of up to 3".
